OK, a lot of talk is of some value, but action speaks
much louder.  In this case the action needed is an ANN
that can be presented with a random sequence of binary
patterns, and then repeats them back one at a time. 
It could be in reverse order, or in the order of
presentation.  Each pattern might be 16 bits, or maybe
only 8 or 10.

The model is a human who is told to dial a phone
number, and then dials it.

=====
Mitchell Timin
http://annevolve.sourceforge.net
